Judul: Feeding of particle-based materials in continuous solid dosage manufacturing: a material science perspective
Abstrak:
Based on the demands of an increasingly diverse patient population
and the requirement for a robust manufacturing supply chain
to combat drug shortages, pharmaceutical product manufacturing
is now advancing toward efficient, flexible and continuous processing
[1]. This has increased the need for in-depth knowledge of
the relevant material properties in terms of manufacturability and
process understanding. The material science tetrahedron (MST),
the manufacturability classification system (MCS) and material
database approaches are some preliminary concepts and initiatives...
